com.jonathan.survivor.screens

Class GameScreen.GameListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jonathan.survivor.screens.GameScreen.GameListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jonathan.survivor.WorldListener
    Enclosing class:
    GameScreen

    public class GameScreen.GameListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.jonathan.survivor.WorldListener
    Listens to any events delegated by the World pertinent to the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameScreen.GameListener() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void gameOver()
      Delegates from the World when the player dies in combat.
      void onAnimationComplete()
      Called when an animation finishes playing.
      void onPlayAnimation()
      Called when the game is supposed to play an animation which overlays the screen.
      void switchToCombat()
      Delegated when the versus animation stops playing, and the player switches to combat mode to fight a zombie.
      void switchToExploration()
      Delegated after the KO animation plays in COMBAT mode.

      Delegates when the player wins the game, after having played the TELEPORTER animation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameScreen.GameListener

        public GameScreen.GameListener()

    • Method Detail

      • onPlayAnimation

        public void onPlayAnimation()
        Called when the game is supposed to play an animation which overlays the screen. In this case, the game should be paused until the animation stops playing.
        Specified by:
        onPlayAnimation in interface com.jonathan.survivor.WorldListener

      • onAnimationComplete

        public void onAnimationComplete()
        Called when an animation finishes playing. This is for overlay animations which fill the screen. When complete, the GameScreen knows to resume the game.
        Specified by:
        onAnimationComplete in interface com.jonathan.survivor.WorldListener

      • switchToCombat

        public void switchToCombat()
        Delegated when the versus animation stops playing, and the player switches to combat mode to fight a zombie.
        Specified by:
        switchToCombat in interface com.jonathan.survivor.WorldListener

      • switchToExploration

        public void switchToExploration()
        Delegated after the KO animation plays in COMBAT mode. Switches the HUD back to the Exploration HUD.
        Specified by:
        switchToExploration in interface com.jonathan.survivor.WorldListener

      • gameOver

        public void gameOver()
        Delegates from the World when the player dies in combat. Switches to the GameOverHud.
        Specified by:
        gameOver in interface com.jonathan.survivor.WorldListener

      • winGame

        public void winGame()
        Delegates when the player wins the game, after having played the TELEPORTER animation. Returns to the MainMenu.
        Specified by:
        winGame in interface com.jonathan.survivor.WorldListener
